game_description: this is a game with movement to where you have to move with ur hands and arms you can have fun in a zero gravity zone and name changing and much more get ready to explore!
review_2: I thought Capuchin and gorilla taggers were the best games ever lol no this game is so cool it’s my fav game it is nice and it has really nice people cool game bro 10/10
review_3: It gives you free months has super good cosmetics and even has third person mode go check it out it is a good game best grill tag knock off I've ever seen my second favorite girl tag knockoff is cloud run it's a pretty good game but yeah this is too
review_4: Really good gorilla tag fan game! The cosmetics and physics are very good, I love multiplayer! There is a great community definitely check it out!
review_5: I think this is the best game. I’ve played five star all the time very good community. The game is just a great.
